Description:
------------
What an incredible saga of Metroid Prime is compiled into this package of three games for the Wii.

METROID PRIME - Samus Aran, a bounty hunter by trade, pursues the evil Space Pirates in the first game of the series. His intention is to use a genetic mutagen called Phazon to create a super army and take over the universe. While shares of the series have never been home to deep involvement of stories, Metroid Prime breaks the shell to offer one of the most interesting and worthy sagas read-yet.

Metroid Prime 2: Echoes - Journey to a world torn in light and darkness. Pursued by a mysterious entity and a warring race called the Ing, Samus Aran must explore the light and dark worlds of this doomed planet to discover the secrets of arms and increase your suit and your abilities. And now for the first time in the history of popular Metroid franchise, up to four players can battle each other in their search for weapons, they battle across ceilings and turn into Morph Balls to make their escape.

Metroid Prime 3: Corruption - Galactic Federation's Base Sector Zero is under attack by space pirates. Samus must boot up the generator to restore the defense systems. But at the end of their path, someone awful is waiting for her. The war initiated by Dark Samus and the Space Pirates skins across many planets as they attempt to corrupt each with Phazon seeds. Players use the Wii Remote and Nunchuk to explore alien landscapes, hunt for weapons and information, and destroy the seeds. Saving the planets from Corruption is not enough, however. Finally, players must defeat Samus' mortal enemy, Dark Samus.
